ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure.drosophila.wingpouch

Class WPouchStructureSnake

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure.StructureSnake
      • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure.drosophila.wingpouch.WPouchStructureSnake
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    big.ij.snake2D.Snake2D
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmbryoStructureSnake

    public class WPouchStructureSnake
extends StructureSnake
    Describes a structure as a snake/B-splines.
    Version:
    November 28, 2011
    Author:
    Ricard Delgado-Gonzalo (ricard.delg...@gmail.com), Thomas Schaffter (thomas.schaff...@gmail.com)

      • setNodes

        public void setNodes(big.ij.snake2D.Snake2DNode[] node)
        This method provides a mutator to the snake-defining nodes. It will be called repeatedly by the methods Snake2DKeeper.interact() and Snake2DKeeper.optimize(). These calls are unconditional and may happen whether the method isAlive() returns true or false.

      • expand

        public void expand(double amplitude)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Expand positively or negatively the control points defining the contour of the structure. The amplitude of the given expansion is applied from the center of mass of the structure. The amplitude of the expansion is given in px.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
